param.string:
Identified `/srv` as the primary consumer of disk space (738G). The `/mnt` directory, which contains NFS/CIFS shares, is also taking up 38G.
Next step: Investigate the contents of `/srv` to determine which subdirectories or files are responsible for this usage.

value.string: Performance, DiskUsage, Workstation, Maintenance, venus, limbo-bd, srv-investigation
